*div1 type="summary"* *p*Sylvester Murphy to Austin, August 4, 1831. Land. Major Douglass falsely claims negroes.*/p* */div1*
*div1 type="body"*
*p**location_mentioned*Gin Place */location_mentioned**date_mentioned n="08-04-1831">4th August 1831*/date_mentioned**/p* *p**person_mentioned*Col. S. F. Austin*/person_mentioned**/p*
*p*Dr Sir. I received your favour of the *date_mentioned n="08-01-1831">1st Inst*/date_mentioned* by *person_mentioned*Mr Hunter*/person_mentioned*, I am truely sorry I could not obtain the *location_mentioned*Clear Creek tract*/location_mentioned*. I am a *person_mentioned*stranger */person_mentioned*in the *location_mentioned*country */location_mentioned*and my health has been and still remains so bad I have had no oppertunity of travling to make a Selection- even one or two rides to *location_mentioned*Brazoria */location_mentioned*has weakened me in such a manner I have been compeld to take two days to it. *person_mentioned*Mr Hunter*/person_mentioned* informs me that *person_mentioned*Major Douglass*/person_mentioned* has made an Entry of my *person_mentioned*Negroes */person_mentioned*in your office as his *person_mentioned*property*/person_mentioned*— Now fair, I wish to prove to you that I am, and know, I shall always remain above falsehood, I told you the *person_mentioned*property */person_mentioned*was mine Enclosed you will receive Vouchers sufficient to satisfy you and every other *person_mentioned*person */person_mentioned*that he does not, nor ever did own any part of the *person_mentioned*property */person_mentioned*in my possession nor does he own one Dollars worth in the *location_mentioned*Colony*/location_mentioned*—his statement is gratuitous and false and unauthorized by me—*/p*
*p*When the *person_mentioned*Major */person_mentioned*went to *location_mentioned*San Phillipe*/location_mentioned* *date_mentioned n="03-xx-1831">last March*/date_mentioned*, I asked him to take an *person_mentioned*Indenture */person_mentioned*that he was a *person_mentioned*witness */person_mentioned*to and prove it before the *person_mentioned*proper authority*/person_mentioned* in *location_mentioned*San Phillipe*/location_mentioned*, when he returnd I asked him why he had not done so— he then told me that himself and *person_mentioned*Mr S. Williams*/person_mentioned* had a misunderstanding—but he did not tell me he had presumed to enter the property as his, and I do hope his imprudent conduct will not be suffered to weigh one jot against me—*/p*
*p*I also inclose you a letter from *person_mentioned*Capt- John Austin*/person_mentioned*, and I think I may venture to say (without egotism) that they are few men that have settled in this *location_mentioned*Colony */location_mentioned*that have behaved better, and have made more *person_mentioned*friends */person_mentioned*in so short a time.*/p*
*p*I have been anxious, and nothing but delicate health has presented me from coming to*location_mentioned* San Phillipe*/location_mentioned* long since, to comply with the terms of the Law, *person_mentioned*Mr Hall*/person_mentioned* can inform you I have been very sick—but I say again, as soon as my health permits I will come up and do every thing that is necessary to make a *person_mentioned*Citizen*/person_mentioned*-— Under those considerations I do hope sir you will reconsider my Case and if it is a possible thing give me the *location_mentioned*Clear Creek tract of land*/location_mentioned*— I assure your sir I remain your very obednt and humble Servant*/p*
*p**person_mentioned*Sylvester Murphy*/person_mentioned**/p*
*p*NB you will observe the *person_mentioned*Major */person_mentioned*acted as *person_mentioned*agent */person_mentioned*for me in clearing the *person_mentioned*Negroes*/person_mentioned*, my health was so bad I could not attend to it, and on the back of the Manifest he acknowledges that fact— *person_mentioned*S M*/person_mentioned**/p*
*/div1*
